errorProcessingImage.description: Log message when there is an error processing an image.

imageCouldBeSmaller.description: Report message when a image could be smaller

noConfigFound.description: Log messag when a configuration for cloudinary can't be found

noValidConfig.description: Report message when a valid configuration for Cloudinary can't be found
noValidConfig.message: No valid configuration for Cloudinary found. Hint could not run.

totalSize.description: Report message when the total size you can save is bigger than the threshold
totalSize.message: Total size savings optimizing the images on '$1' could be of around $2kB.
